snippet: Four former New York mayors, including Edward I. Koch, are among those buried in the Washington Heights graveyard that sits in the shadow of the Church of the Intercession.
abstract: Visitors to Manhattan's Washington Heights neighborhood are advised to see small graveyard at the Church of the Intercession, where four former mayors lay buried, as well as larger Trinity Church Cemetery and Mausoleum in same neighborhood; Taszo Espresso Bar and La Libertad Salvadoran restaurant offer nearby refreshment.
lead_paragraph: Four former New York mayors, including Edward I. Koch, are among those buried in the Washington Heights graveyard that sits in the shadow of the Church of the Intercession.

headline.print_headline: Resting Place for the High and the Low
headline.seo: The Trinity Church Cemetery in Washington Heights Holds Plenty of History
headline.main: Resting Place for the High and the Low
